title: Heart of the Hounded
description: Hey, are you okay?Are you a supernatural too, being hunted as a trophy? Do you have nowhere to go and no one to turn to?Eden is here. We can provide protection. Safety. Understanding.You just have to find us first.When Layla stumbled across the Big, Bad Wolf, her life changed forever. Now that her eyes are open to all the things that go bump in the night? There's no going back.HEART OF THE HOUNDED is a full-length Reverse Harem prequel to the upcoming Eden Academy series.
author: Grace McGinty
